org.apache.hadoop.ha

Class StreamPumper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.ha.StreamPumper

  •  class StreamPumper
extends Object
    Class responsible for pumping the streams of the subprocess out to log4j. stderr is pumped to WARN level and stdout is pumped to INFO level
